mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE ST_DEPT_CD_HIERARCHY AS( /* StDeptCd.getStDeptCdListWithHierarchy */ SELECT 1 AS LEVEL , DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM , SORT_SEQ , USE_YN , UPR_DEPT_CD , JOB_GRP_CD , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM , CONCAT('\',SORT_SEQ||DEPT_CD) AS HIERARCHY , CONCAT('',DEPT_NM) AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM ST_DEPT_CD A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND (UPR_DEPT_CD IS NULL OR UPR_DEPT_CD = '') UNION ALL SELECT LEVEL + 1 , T1.DEPT_CD , T1.DEPT_NM , T1.SORT_SEQ , T1.USE_YN , T1.UPR_DEPT_CD , T1.JOB_GRP_CD , T1.SYS_REG_ID , T1.SYS_REG_DTM , T1.SYS_MOD_ID , T1.SYS_MOD_DTM , CONCAT_WS('\', T2.HIERARCHY, TRIM(TO_CHAR(T1.SORT_SEQ,'000'))||T1.DEPT_CD) AS HIERARCHY , CONCAT('',T2.HIERARCHY_TEXT,'>'||T1.DEPT_NM) AS HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM ST_DEPT_CD T1 , ST_DEPT_CD_HIERARCHY T2 WHERE T2.DEPT_CD = T1.UPR_DEPT_CD AND T1.JOB_GRP_CD = #{jobGrpCd} ) SELECT LEVEL , DEPT_CD , DEPT_NM , SORT_SEQ , USE_YN , UPR_DEPT_CD , JOB_GRP_CD , SYS_REG_ID , SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , SYS_MOD_DTM , HIERARCHY , HIERARCHY_TEXT FROM ST_DEPT_CD_HIERARCHY ORDER BY HIERARCHY, SORT_SEQ
